name: starfish and roses
description: Based on the tutorial at http://krazydad.com/tutorials/circles_js/. A code error resulted in the 'galaxy swarm' sketch.

name: galactic swarm
description: Actually a broken version of 'starfish and roses', but I like it better.

name: sierpinski by duplication
description: A Sierpinski triangle iteratively created by shrinking and tripling the current image at each step

name: sierpinski chaos game
description:
A processing implementation of the chaos-game algorithm to generate a Sierpinski triangle:

  1. Take 3 points in a plane to form a triangle, you need not draw it.
  2. Randomly select any point inside the triangle and consider that your current position.
  3. Randomly select any one of the 3 vertex points.
  4. Move half the distance from your current position to the selected vertex.
  5. Plot the current position.
  6. Repeat from step 3.

- Wikipedia: Sierpinski triangle

name: polygon chaos game
description: The Sierpinski triangle chaos game algorithm generalized to other shapes by adding additional vertices

name: fern chaos game
description: A Processing implementation of Barnsley's fern algorithm as a chaos game (based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barnsley_fern)

name: fibonacci fractal
description: A fractal drawing implementation based on <a href="https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-00367972/document">Alexis Monnerot-Dumaine's research paper "The Fibonacci Word fractal"</a.>
